name: 薛文景
objective:
Examines current information on the physical and mechanical characteristics of titanium alloys used in the implantation, with the long-term prosthetic requirements.
本課程在討論金屬性質與應用在臨床上。課程內容包括生醫金屬材料之發展,牙醫材料之應用,並配合複合材料及其腐蝕機制在生醫工程之應用,與探討生醫金屬之醫學工程問題。
schedule:
週次/單元主題
1.Natural synovial joint　　Degeration of weight bearing joints　　
2.TJR arthroplasty 　　The TJR orthopaedic surgery　　
3 .THR & TKR joint replacements　　
4.Hip and knee joints　　　　　　
5.McKee and metal-on-metal hip process-From stainless steel to Cobalt-chromium-molybdenum alloy 　　　　　　
6-7.Different femoral head/cup combinations
8.CoCrMo/UHMWPE, /Aluminum Ceramic/, and CoCrMo /CoCrMo　　　　Oral tests　　
9期中考試(open books and take home exam)
10.Characteristics of Orthopaedic metallic implant materials　　　　11.Stainless steel
12.Cobalt-base alloys
13.Ti % Ti-base alloys　　
14.Brief overview of physical metallurgy of titanium alloys　　Microstructures of α, near-α, α+β, and metastableβ titanium alloys　　　　　　
15.Biocompatibility and corrosion behaviors of orthopaedic titanium alloys　　Passive layer and the nature of surface layer　　　　　　
15.Mechanical properties of Orthopaedic titanium alloys　　Fatigue, elastic modulus values, and tribological studies/friction and wear　　　　　　Oral tests　　
16.期末考試
